languages.text: "По счастью — нет, Ваша Светлость. Смутьяны рьяно выступают против ереси, активно пополняют ряды планетарной стражи людьми, исправно перевыполняют норму и посещают молебны. Клан бригадиров активно участвовал в выявлении подполья почитателей Губительных сил и раскрыл две крупных ячейки, действовавшие вполне успешно. Наши агенты вполне уверены, что вероятность нахождения среди них агентов Последнего восхода даже ниже, чем в других слоях населения".

"Thankfully, no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The rabble-rousers zealously oppose heresy, fill the ranks of the planetary guard with new recruits, regularly outperform quotas, and attend prayer service. The foreman clan has been actively involved in uncovering the underground devotees of the Ruinous Powers and has discovered two large, successfully operating cells. Our agents are quite confident that the likelihood of them harbouring agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn is far lower than in other segments of the population."
languages.original_text: "По счастью — нет, Ваша Светлость. Смутьяны рьяно выступают против ереси, активно пополняют ряды планетарной стражи людьми, исправно перевыполняют норму и посещают молебны. Клан бригадиров активно участвовал в выявлении подполья почитателей Губительных сил и раскрыл две крупных ячейки, действовавшие вполне успешно. Наши агенты вполне уверены, что вероятность нахождения среди них агентов Последнего восхода даже ниже, чем в других слоях населения".

traits.locale_text: "Thankfully, no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The rebels zealously oppose heresy, actively fill the ranks of planetary guard with new people, regularly go over the quota and attend the prayers. The brigadier clan had been actively involved in uncovering the underground devotees of the Ruinous Powers and had discovered two successfully operating large cells. Our agents are quite confident that it is less likely that the agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn are among them than among the other sections of the population.:

languages.text: “好消息是，没有任何证据能表明这件事情和异端分子有关，大人。那些叛乱分子反对异端邪说，积极招募新成员，出席祈祷仪式，还超额完成了定期任务。领班氏族一直在积极消灭信奉毁灭之力的地下教派，还发现了两个运作良好的大型邪教组织。我们的特工确信，这场骚乱恐怕不太可能是潜伏起来的终末黎明邪教特工煽动起来的。”
languages.original_text: "Thankfully, no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The rabble-rousers zealously oppose heresy, fill the ranks of the planetary guard with new recruits, regularly outperform quotas, and attend prayer service. The foreman clan has been actively involved in uncovering the underground devotees of the Ruinous Powers and has discovered two large, successfully operating cells. Our agents are quite confident that the likelihood of them harbouring agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn is far lower than in other segments of the population."

“好消息是，没有任何证据能表明这件事情和异端分子有关，大人。那些反叛者们反对异端邪说，积极招募新成员，出席祈祷仪式，还超额完成了定期任务。领班氏族一直在积极消灭信奉毁灭之力的地下教派，还发现了两个运作良好的大型邪教组织。我们的特工确信，这场骚乱恐怕不太可能是终末黎明邪教特工煽动起来的。”

languages.text: «Afortunadamente, no, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Los agitadores se oponen fervientemente a la herejía, llenan las filas de la guardia planetaria con nuevos reclutas, superan regularmente las cuotas y asisten al servicio de oración. El clan de capataces ha participado activamente en el descubrimiento de devotos clandestinos de los Poderes Ruinosos y ha identificado dos de sus mayores redes operativas. Nuestros agentes nos aseguran que la probabilidad de infiltración por parte del Culto del Amanecer Final es mucho menor que en otros segmentos de la población».
languages.original_text: "Thankfully, no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The rabble-rousers zealously oppose heresy, fill the ranks of the planetary guard with new recruits, regularly outperform quotas, and attend prayer service. The foreman clan has been actively involved in uncovering the underground devotees of the Ruinous Powers and has discovered two large, successfully operating cells. Our agents are quite confident that the likelihood of them harbouring agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn is far lower than in other segments of the population."

traits.locale_text: «Afortunadamente, no, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Los agitadores se oponen fervientemente a la herejía, llenan las filas de la guardia planetaria con nuevos reclutas, superan regularmente las cuotas y asisten al servicio de oración. El clan de capataces ha participado activamente en el descubrimiento de devotos clandestinos de los Poderes Ruinosos y ha identificado dos de sus mayores redes operativas. Nuestros agentes nos aseguran que la probabilidad de infiltración por parte del Culto del Amanecer Final es mucho menor que en otros segmentos de la población».

languages.text: 「幸運なことに、それはありません、陛下。反乱軍は異端にものすごく反対し、惑星護衛隊に新人を積極的に採用し、定期的に割り当てをこなし、礼拝に出席しています。准将一族は、地下に潜む〈禍つ神々〉の信者の摘発に積極的に関与し、巨大で異常なく作動しているセルを2つ発見しました。私たちの諜報員は、最後の夜明け魔女団からの諜報員が潜入する可能性は、その他の人口層よりもはるかに低いと確信しています...」
languages.original_text: "Thankfully, no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The rabble-rousers zealously oppose heresy, fill the ranks of the planetary guard with new recruits, regularly outperform quotas, and attend prayer service. The foreman clan has been actively involved in uncovering the underground devotees of the Ruinous Powers and has discovered two large, successfully operating cells. Our agents are quite confident that the likelihood of them harbouring agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn is far lower than in other segments of the population."

traits.locale_text: 「幸運なことに、それはありません、陛下。反乱軍は異端にものすごく反対し、惑星護衛隊に新人を積極的に採用し、定期的に割り当てをこなし、礼拝に出席しています。准将一族は、地下に潜む〈禍つ神々〉の信者の摘発に積極的に関与し、巨大で異常なく作動しているセルを2つ発見しました。私たちの諜報員は、最後の夜明け魔女団からの諜報員が潜入する可能性は、その他の人口層よりもはるかに低いと確信しています...」
「幸運なことに、それはありません、陛下。反乱軍は異端にものすごく反対し、惑星護衛隊に新人を積極的に採用し、定期的に割り当てをこなし、礼拝に出席しています。准将一族は、地下に潜む〈禍つ神々〉の信者の摘発に積極的に関与し、巨大で異常なく作動しているセルを2つ発見しました。私たちの諜報員は、最後の夜明け魔女団からの諜報員が潜入する可能性は、その他の人口層よりもはるかに低いと確信しています...」

languages.text: « Fort heureusement non, Votre Seigneurie. Les fauteurs de trouble s'opposent avec zèle à toute forme d'hérésie, ils approvisionnent les rangs de la garde planétaire en nouvelles recrues, dépassent régulièrement leurs quotas et vont à la messe. Le clan des chefs d'équipe, qui tente de démasquer les fanatiques des Puissances de la Ruine, a réussi à identifier deux cellules importantes. Nos agents sont convaincus que les probabilités d'infiltration par des agents du Culte de l'Aube finale sont bien moindres que dans d'autres franges de la population. »
languages.original_text: "Thankfully, no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The rabble-rousers zealously oppose heresy, fill the ranks of the planetary guard with new recruits, regularly outperform quotas, and attend prayer service. The foreman clan has been actively involved in uncovering the underground devotees of the Ruinous Powers and has discovered two large, successfully operating cells. Our agents are quite confident that the likelihood of them harbouring agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn is far lower than in other segments of the population."

Nos agents sont convaincus que les probabilités d'infiltration par des agents du Culte de l'Aube finale sont bien moindres que dans d'autres franges de la population. »

languages.text: "Glücklicherweise nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Aufwiegler stellen sich fanatisch gegen die Ketzerei. Sie füllen die Reihen der planetaren Wache mit neuen Rekruten, überbieten regelmäßig die Quoten und beten eifrig. Der Vorarbeiter-Clan war aktiv daran beteiligt, die heimlichen Verehrer der Mächte der Zerstörung zu enttarnen. Er hat zwei große, erfolgreich operierende Zellen entdeckt. Unsere Agenten sind überzeugt, die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass sie Agenten des Kults der letzten Dämmerung beherbergen, ist sehr viel geringer als in anderen Bevölkerungsgruppen."
languages.original_text: "Thankfully, no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The rabble-rousers zealously oppose heresy, fill the ranks of the planetary guard with new recruits, regularly outperform quotas, and attend prayer service. The foreman clan has been actively involved in uncovering the underground devotees of the Ruinous Powers and has discovered two large, successfully operating cells. Our agents are quite confident that the likelihood of them harbouring agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn is far lower than in other segments of the population."

traits.locale_text: "Glücklicherweise nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Aufwiegler stellen sich fanatisch gegen die Ketzerei. Sie füllen die Reihen der planetaren Wache mit neuen Rekruten, überbieten regelmäßig die Quoten und beten eifrig. Der Vorarbeiter-Clan war aktiv daran beteiligt, die heimlichen Verehrer der Mächte der Zerstörung zu enttarnen. Er hat zwei große, erfolgreich operierende Zellen entdeckt. Unsere Agenten sind überzeugt, die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass sie Agenten des Kults der letzten Dämmerung beherbergen, ist sehr viel geringer als in anderen Bevölkerungsgruppen."

"Glücklicherweise nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Rebellen stellen sich fanatisch gegen die Ketzerei. Sie füllen die Reihen der planetaren Wache durch neue Rekruten, überbieten regelmäßig die Quoten und beten geflissentlich. Der Brigadierclan war aktiv daran beteiligt, die heimlichen Verehrer der Mächte der Zerstörung zu enttarnen. Er hat zwei große, erfolgreich operierende Zellen entdeckt. Unsere Agenten sind überzeugt, dass die Wahrscheinlichkeit einer Infiltration durch Agenten des Kults der letzten Dämmerung sehr viel geringer ist als in anderen Bevölkerungsgruppen."

languages.text: "Neyse ki yok {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kışkırtıcılar, büyük bir gayretle kâfirliğe karşı çıkıyor. Gezegen muhafızı saflarını yeni gelenlerle dolduruyor, düzenli olarak kotanın üzerine çıkıyor ve kutsal ayinlere katılıyorlar. Ustabaşı klanı, aktif olarak Yıkıcı Güçler'in gizli zahitlerini açığa çıkarmada yer alıyor ve şu ana dek işlevsel iki ünite keşfetti. Ajanlarımız, Nihai Şafak Tarikatı ajanlarını barındırma ihtimalinin nüfusun diğer kısımlarına kıyasla çok daha düşük olduğundan bir hayli eminler."
languages.original_text: "Thankfully, no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The rabble-rousers zealously oppose heresy, fill the ranks of the planetary guard with new recruits, regularly outperform quotas, and attend prayer service. The foreman clan has been actively involved in uncovering the underground devotees of the Ruinous Powers and has discovered two large, successfully operating cells. Our agents are quite confident that the likelihood of them harbouring agents of the Cult of the Final Dawn is far lower than in other segments of the population."
